startingPosition.instruction: Sit with the legs outstretched in front, feet together and hands besides the buttocks, or sit with a cross-legged pose. Spine Straight. Straighten the arms in front of the body at the shoulder level.

technique.instruction: Inhaling open the hands, palms down and stretch the fingers as wide apart as possible.
Exhaling close the fingers to make a tight fist with the thumbs inside.

info: Move only the hands, every other body part should be motionless.
Deep breathing should be done and movement should be in sync with the breathing.
